abstract: The Justice Department has hired Sandy Litvack, who was its former antitrust chief and the Walt Disney Company‘s former vice chairman, to consult on its probe of Google‘s search advertising deal with Yahoo, according to press reports.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has hired Sandy Litvack, who was its former antitrust chief and the Walt Disney Company‘s former vice chairman, to consult on its probe of Google‘s search advertising deal with Yahoo, according to press reports.

headline.main: Justice Said to Hire Lawyer for Google-Yahoo Tie-Up
